data.eml:eml: A new genus and three new species of Neotropical Tanyproctini (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neita, Jhon Cesar, Ocampo, Federico C. (2012): A new genus and three new species of Neotropical Tanyproctini (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Melolonthinae). Zootaxa 3281: 41-55, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213516
